attributes.action: Do not impose restrictions to those who decline any vaccines, for any reason.
attributes.additional_details: We the people have the right to choose whether or not we accept medical intervention such as vaccines, including the COVID-19 vaccination. Restricting the movements and actions of those who decline the above treatments is a direct violation of human rights. Everyone should have the right to access (including but not limited to) food, amenities, financial support, work, public transport, rented accommodation and travel.
attributes.background: People have the right to decline vaccines, including the COVID-19 vaccine. Stop the government from imposing restrictions on those who don't consent to vaccinations, including but not limited to: access to financial help; food, amenities, work, rented accommodation, public transport or education.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government haven't indicated an intention to impose restrictions, so we're not sure what you want to stop. 

You might like to sign and share this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
	
Or you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to enable.
